dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 294 IH: Non-Recognition of Russian Annexation of Ukrainian Territory Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Keating (for himself and Mr. Fitzpatrick) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit the United States Government from recognizing the Russian Federation’s claim of sovereignty over any portion of the sovereign territory of Ukraine, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Non-Recognition of Russian Annexation of Ukrainian Territory Act.

section.header: Prohibition against United States recognition of the Russian Federation’s claim of sovereignty over any portion of Ukraine

subsection.text: It is the policy of the United States not to recognize the Russian Federation’s claim of sovereignty over any portion of the internationally recognized territory of Ukraine, including its airspace and its territorial waters.

In accordance with subsection (a), no Federal department or agency may take any action or extend any assistance that implies recognition of the Russian Federation’s claim of sovereignty over any portion of the internationally recognized territory of Ukraine, including its airspace and its territorial waters.
